title: Погружение
overview: How could an innocent and slightly illegal trip to a classified career end up? Igor, a black digger, diver and just an adventure lover, comes here with his brother and a group of friends in search of an ancient settlement. Diving into a quarry turns into a surprise... Divers find themselves prisoners of the anomalous zone. The zone was classified due to secret experiments, and... people were left to live in their cocoons. Will they be able to get out of a parallel world that exists according to their own laws? ..
